name: Configuration Settings File
summary: Learn about .SQD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Some of the different information fields contained in SQD files are the Main SQR program source files, the destination for the log output file, and database type.

To create a SQD file go to File → Save Configuration As... in the SP Debugger for SQR menu bar. To load a previously saved configuration set go to File → Open Configuration... in the program menu bar.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
